body:
Okay so I've been really bored and I'm kinda interested in video calling some people on the avicus network! Anyone can skype me and if you have any questions please ask them. My skype is "Yourfacehaha" so if you are interested in video calling from 3pm EST-8pm on a weekday just message me first and I'll be interested in talking!

Post that made me want to do this: http://avicus.net/forums/b3314b36a?page=1
